original_text: Do not work for food that spoils, but for food that endures to eternal life, which the Son of Man will give you. For on him God the Father has placed his seal of approval.”
korean_text: 썩을 양식을 위하여 일하지 말고 영생하도록 있는 양식을 위하여 하라 이 양식은 인자가 너희에게 주리니 인자는 아버지 하나님께서 인치신 자니라

sentences.original_text: Do not work for food that spoils
sentences.korean_translation: 썩어 없어질 음식을 위해 일하지 말고

sentences.original_text: but for food that endures to eternal life
which the Son of Man will give you
God the Father has placed his seal of approval
